subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn skied conservatively and finished 40th of 60 starters in a World Cup downhill, 10 months after major knee surgery and less than three weeks after partially re-tearing a ligament.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn skied conservatively and finished 40th of 60 starters in a World Cup downhill, 10 months after major knee surgery and less than three weeks after partially re-tearing a ligament.
